Title: Masahiro Watanabe
Body: on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition, San Fransisco, CA, June, 1996 "Real-Time Implementation of Depth from Defocus," M. Watanabe, S. K. Nayar, and M. Noguchi, Proceedings of SPIE Conference: Three-Dimensional and Unconventional Imaging for Industrial Inspection and Metrology 2599: pp.
